name: Mood Farm
description:
Summary

Welcome to Mood Farm, a therapeutic game with mental health tracking tools. 

Here you can complete simple tasks to improve your wellbeing, while harvesting mushrooms and trading with fluffy customers.

You will need to:

  • journal and track your emotions to earn flour;
  • complete your daily tasks (chores, self-care and daily routine) to earn wood;
  • do some basic exercises to earn vegetables; 
  • answer therapeutic, humorous and existential questions to get fish;
  • go for a walk to harvest berries, mushrooms and fruits.

Then you can cook a delicious meal and sell it to one of the farm dwellers. You will receive a compliment and some coins.

Your main goal is to collect 1000 coins. That will allow you to buy a big air balloon which you can use to send your fear as far as possible.

  • Mood Farm allows you to export all your actions history and share it with your therapist.
  • The game has two modes – dark and bright.
  • Works in Windows and Android.

Psychological Bases

Mood Farm uses Behavioral Activation strategy for treating depression. It’s a CBT skill designed to increase a contact with positively rewarding activities. Behavioral Activation is based on the understanding that depression keeps us from doing things that bring enjoyment and meaning to our lives, so we work to reverse this cycle using our actions and choices. You can learn more about Behavioral Activation here, here, and here.
